roleset.name: "I Don't Care"

role.descr: "I" (will be represented in the tree as *PRO*)

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Relation to care.01

example.name: abbreviation: IDC
example.text: Yeah I mean I 'd prolly be last resort . I got no plans for Saturday but *PRO* IDC bout arena football too much . If other ppl would rather go take them
